paramInformation.label: Timer to Switch OFF the Channel 1
paramInformation.description: Defines the time after which the Channel 1 is switched OFF

paramInformation.label: Timer to Switch ON the Channel 1

paramInformation.label: Start-Up Status
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of the device following a restart.

options.label: OFF_OFF - Both channel 1 and channel 2 off
ON_ON - Both channel 1 and channel 2 on
Previous status - Status prior to restart

paramInformation.label: Configuration Reset
paramInformation.description: Defines which parameters should be reset to default values

paramInformation.label: Type of External Switch Both Inputs
paramInformation.description: Defines the type of external switch connected both to input 1 and input 2.

paramInformation.description: Define the switch type connected to the input 2
